channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: High-Stakes Egg Bowl Could Be Overshadowed by Future of Ole Miss HC Lane Kiffin
item.description: The 2025 "Egg Bowl" between Mississippi and Mississippi State has a new subplot with Lane Kiffin that could overshadow the game.

item.title: 2025 NFL Defensive Tiers Week 13: Texans on Top; Eagles Drop; Browns Hold Firm
item.description: Philly's defense isn't playing top tier while the Browns are on the verge of it. Here's how all 32 NFL defenses rank heading into Week 13.

item.title: Last Night in College Basketball: Indiana Basketball Dominated on Tuesday
item.description: Indiana's men's and women's teams both dominated, Coen Carr loves a dunk, Jazzy Davidson had a night, a freshman dropped 40 points and more from Tuesd...

item.title: Lions vs. Packers 2025 Prediction, Odds, Picks
item.description: Preview the Week 13 matchup between the Detroit Lions and Green Bay Packers with predictions, odds, over/under, spread, betting lines and more.

item.title: 2025 College Football Week 14 Buzz: OK State Hires Coach; CSU Hires Former UCLA HC
item.description: Here's the latest on what's happening around college football entering Week 14.

item.title: NFL Week 13 buzz: What we're hearing on the struggling Bucs, Pickens' next deal, fantasy football
item.description: Are the Buccaneers worried about their losing streak? Will the Cowboys extend George Pickens? Here's the latest intel, plus fantasy football advice.

item.title: Week 14 Anger Index: Why BYU, Notre Dame and others should be mad
item.description: The five teams that have the most to be upset about over the latest CFP ranking.

item.title: Luka calls out slippery court after win over Clips
item.description: Luka Doncic had 43 points and fell one rebound shy of a triple-double but complained about the court conditions for the NBA Cup win over the Clippers.

item.title: CFP Bubble Watch after Tuesday's ranking: Who needs a win during Rivalry Week?
item.description: Trying to make sense of the constantly evolving playoff picture, conference by conference.

item.title: Who's ready for Thanksgiving Day football? Picks, predictions and X factors
item.description: Who will win Packers-Lions, Chiefs-Cowboys and Bengals-Ravens?
